name: 1970s Vintage Claralura Original Aqua Green Dress
description:
1970s Vintage aqua green Dallas Dynasty style dress by Claralura Original. Medium size shoulders pads and zips in the back. 

Measurements taken with garment laying flat, not doubled. 

Bust: 19" 
Waist: 18"
Hips: 21.5"
Length: 45"

name: 1980s Vintage Marnie West Black/Gold Cocktail Dress
description:
1980's or early 1990's vintage black velveteen cocktail / party dress by Marnie West.  Super cute halter top dress with gold trimmed sweetheart bodice. Secures with a zipper in the back. The skirt is lined with netting (see pic). Made in USA.

Size: 5

Bust: 16"
Waist: 13.5"

description:

• Classic shift cut
• Big bows on shoulders 
• Back zip entry
• Gorgeous blue green color
